30  signal.signal(signal.SIGINT, original_sigint)

36 def move1():
37  zielzeit = 2 # in millisekunden
38  zielwert = math.pi /2
39  steigung = zielwert/zielzeit
40  start = rospy.get_time() #rospy.Time.now().nsecs/1000
41  #print(steigung)
42  #while (rospy.Time.now().nsecs/1000<(start + zielzeit)):
43  while (rospy.get_time()<(start + zielzeit)):
44  #print("hi")
45  #position = (rospy.Time.now().nsecs/1000-start) * steigung
46  position = (rospy.get_time()-start)*steigung
47  positionCMD(1,position)
48  positionCMD(2,position)
49  positionCMD(3,position)
50  positionCMD(4,position)
51  positionCMD(5,position)
52  positionCMD(6,position)
53  positionCMD(7,position)
54  rate.sleep()
55  #print("Fertig")

122 def positionCMD(motor, position):
123  if motor>2:
124  st = tmotor_cmd()
125  st.position = position
126  st.kp = 200
127  st.kd = math.sqrt(7)
128  st.status = True
129  st.setzero = False
130  st.velocity = 0
131  st.torque = 0
132  #print(position)
133  if motor==3:
134  pub3.publish(st);
135  # if motor==4:

144 def on_clickStop_Connect():
145  st = tmotor_cmd()
146  st.position = 0
147  st.kp = 0
148  st.kd = 0
149  st.status = False
150  st.setzero = False
151  st.velocity = 0
152  st.torque = 0
153  pub3.publish(st)
154  pub4.publish(st)
155  pub5.publish(st)
156  pub6.publish(st)
157  pub7.publish(st)
